title: Northern Province CM C.V.Vigneswaran takes oath before President Rajapaksa
content: – By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva – The newly elected Northern Province Chief Minister C.V. Vigneswaran was sworn in as the Chief Minister of Northern Province before President Mahinda Rajapaksa at 9.30 am this morning (07 October) at Temple Trees. He took oaths as a member of the northern provincial council and…
